title: Cant buy Riot Points
body: Pls Riot help me when i need to buy some rp it shows this ,,You have exceeded the maximum number of attepms at this time please wait 24 hours and try again,, this happend yesterday and still doing like this i dont know what is the problem so please tell me

replies.body: It sounds like you've tried to make that purchase too many times with the wrong information. We have it set up to lock you out after too many failed attempts to help protect your bank account just in case someone is trying to steal your card. At this point, you'll need to wait the **full** 24 hours before trying again, or else that timer will reset.
